description: This file defines the ApifyTools class, which integrates with the Apify platform to register and invoke actors as tools within a larger framework. It includes methods for initializing the client, registering actors, and handling actor input schemas, as well as utility functions for managing actor data and creating the client.

classes.name: ApifyTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for integrating Apify actors as tools, allowing registration and invocation of actors with specified input schemas and handling their outputs.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ApifyTools instance, sets up the API client, and registers specified actors as tools.

methods.name: register_actor
methods.description: Registers an individual Apify actor as a tool, creating a wrapper function that calls the actor and processes its results.
